item.description:
Hey Dyke Marchers, please help support Massachusetts Transgender Political Coalition by attending the "Transtastic Halloween Ball" on Saturday, November 1 at 8:00pm.

Event: Transtastic Halloween Ball "Fundraiser for MTPC"
What: Benefit
Host: Massachusetts Transgender Political Coalition (MTPC)
Start Time: Saturday, November 1 at 8:00pm
End Time: Sunday, November 2 at 12:00am
Where: Community Church of Boston

To see more details and RSVP, follow this link: Massachusetts Transgender Political Coalition.

Please note that Dyke March is not sponsoring this event. We are just helping promote it. Thanks.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Massachusetts Transgender Political Coalition's Transtastic Halloween Ball
